articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks Slip as Investors Await Fed Decision: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks inched higher, extending their winning run to a 10th day, ahead of the Federal Reserve’s policy decision with investors speculating the central bank will cut interest rates for the first time this year.
